org.apache.hcatalog.data.transfer
Class ReaderContext

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.hcatalog.data.transfer.ReaderContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
public class ReaderContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable

This class will contain information of different InputSplit obtained at master node and configuration. This class implements Externalizable so it can be serialized using standard java mechanisms.
